title: Scene 2: How You Respond
text:
Your hand still aches. The bleeding has stopped, but something deeper has opened. Not in your skin—in your resolve.

You start thinking clearly for the first time since you entered this place.

Three choices burn in your mind:

Burn it all down. Let someone else take over. Or build something better from the inside out.

choices.text: Burn it down. Sabotage. Revenge. Anarchy.
choices.result: You smile. It’s time to bleed the system from the inside.

choices.text: Hand the responsibility to another patient.
choices.result: They betray you. You’re flagged as unstable.

choices.text: Rebuild it yourself. Slowly. With allies.
choices.result: You begin making a map. Post-It by Post-It.
